questions.question: A business has achieved a competitive advantage when...

choices.answer: They produce and sell goods that customers want
They produce and sell goods of high quality
Produce and sell goods and services better than competitors
Produce and sell goods the same as competitors

questions.question: To become a cost leader, a business can....

choices.answer: Increase the price of their goods
Increase the price of manufacturing goods
Reduce the cost of manufacturing those goods
Focus on the strengths of their product

questions.question: What competitive advantage(s) does BMW use?

choices.answer: Cost leadership
Differentiation
Cost leadership & Improving internal processes
Differentiation & Quality

questions.question: Ikea can afford to sell their furniture at a lower price than Freedom because....

choices.answer: They don't care about profits
They apply efficient internal processes
They produce superior quality products
They like to differentiate on price

questions.question: How can a business reduce its costs to achieve competitive advantage?

choices.answer: Giving hard working managers a bonus
Investing in marketing and advertising campaigns
Outsourcing work to organisations that charge less
Selling their product at a cheaper price

questions.question: How can Apple charge more for an iPhone than Samsung can for it's Galaxy?

choices.answer: It costs more to make an iPhone , so Apple charge more
Apple has a reputation of prestige and quality
Apple have no competitors, so they charge what they want
Samsung has a reputation of producing faulty goods

questions.question: A business that competes on..............? will produce the best product/service in the market.

choices.answer: Cost Leadership
Quality
Differentiation
Focus

questions.question: Differentiation for competitive advantage occurs when....

choices.answer: A business emphasizes unique features of a product
When a business reduces the cost of making its product
A business uses social media to promote the product
When a business makes the best product in the market
